name: Promised Lands artwork tee
description:
Special birthday price until 1/5/11! (Normal price £10.00)
New tee featuring the artwork from new EP, "Promised Lands".
Printed on really comfortable white Gildan SoftStyle t-shirts. (Slimmer fitting than regular Gildan Ultra/Heavy, so advised to go a size up than normal. Small is a great fit for girls).
A copy of In Pursuit Of Courage & Heart is included in every order!

name: Lost On Campus - In Pursuit Of Courage & Heart
description:
New 5 track EP:
1) Open Sesame
2) I'm A Dreamer, Baby!
3) Whisky
4) Coastlines
5) The Party Never Dies

"Straight from the heart"
-Big Cheese

"Ideal for the coming summer months...(Lost On Campus) has surely taken one step further towards greater things" 
- Alter The Press!

"Lost on Campus is going to be shooting for the stars after the release of this record" 
- Room Thirteen

"I just love that. Fresh, vibey and original, with bags of attitude and originality" 
- Tom Robinson, BBC6 Music

"You believe every chord and every syllable...LOC will go far, I’m sure" 
- Punktastic
